name: Cubescape (BethReed)
description:
Cubescape

Avoid death from above, by falling, dodging, and surviving, to beat your opponent for the high score in several modes from Free for All, Co-op, and Competitive.

Controls

CubeScape is a two or four player game, played by sharing your controller with a friend, Use only the analogue sticks to navigate your character through the level.

Credits

Beth Reed

Ethan Bell

Chris Holden

Michaela Newhall
